5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin ‘Abdur-Rahman bin Thabit bin Samit, from his father, from his grandfather, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) performed prayer among Banu ‘Abdul-Ashhal, wearing a cloak in which he was wrapped and putting his hands on it to protect them from the cold of the pebbles

chapter.ara-name: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى الثِّيَابِ فِي الْحَرِّ وَالْبَرْدِ
chapter.eng-name: Prostrating on a garment when it is hot or cold
